items.titolo: Being rude to ChatGPT changes you - and maybe even your relationships
items.descrizione: From Alexa to ChatGPT, our interactions with AI are reshaping communication norms. Here's why how we talk to machines can affect real human relationships.

items.titolo: AMD's Ryzen AI 400 series includes the first Copilot+ desktop CPU — Team Red refreshes Zen 5 APUs and Strix Halo
items.descrizione: AMD’s new Ryzen AI 400 ‘Gorgon Point’ APUs are primarily driven by a clock speed bump, featuring similar silicon as the previous generation otherwise.

items.titolo: Google Gemini Is Taking Control of Humanoid Robots on Auto Factory Floors
items.descrizione: Google DeepMind and Boston Dynamics are teaming up to integrate Gemini into a humanoid robot called Atlas.
